articles.author: Justinas Baltrusaitis
articles.title: Analyst reveals 3 altcoins to buy now amid Bitcoin's rally - Finbold - Finance in Bold
articles.description: Bitcoin has regained 50% market dominance, prompting investors to shift attention towards other digital assets that may also join the rally.
articles.content:
The cryptocurrency market is currently experiencing a short-term bullish trend, primarily driven by Bitcoin (BTC), which recently reached a new high for 2023, surpassing $30,000.
